schema:creator: Long, J.D.
schema:description: Racing stable of Roy Baker. For details, see trip report 17. ([a](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/1850a)) Side-walls erected entirely of adobe brick manufactured by A.B. McIntyre. Note corrall fence at left and manure pit at right of same construction. Similar barn at left background erected of frame and vertical siding to hasten construction pending arrival of carload of horses from Kentucky. ([b](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/1850b)) Second barn erected showing construction with veneer of adobe block and stucco on front to improve appearance.
schema:keywords: .1 Materials, manufacture, tests, strength, preservation, etc.
schema:name: Barnes of Adobe Brick, Roy Baker Ranch, Saugus, Los Angeles County, California (b)
schema:publisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
schema:sdPublisher: UC Davis, Archives and Special Collections
